artist: Kokoro & Moi, Helsinki and New York City
description: three small booklets(a-c), one poster(d) and one large pamphlet(e); each have blue round "World Design Capital, Helsinki 2012" logo on them; small booklets have colorful designs on outside cover that match the poster and the large pamphlet has photo of person drawing on their hand with a pen
title: Graphic Identity and Branding for Helsinki World Design
